The Top 5 Most Terrifying Scenes in Movie History

Kelan Young writes postcards to the cast and crew responsible for some of the most frightening moments in movie history.

By Kelan Young

Mailed on October 31, 2014

Before I Go To Sleep

Dear Laurie Sparham,
Stills Photographer

By Di Golding

John Wick

Dear Jonathan Eusebio,
Fight Coordinator

By Tim McEown

Nightcrawler

Dear Mike Smith,
Second Unit Director

By Tim McEown

Birdman or The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance

Dear John Doe,
Generic Film Critic

By Tim McEown

The Province of Television

By Tim McEown

TV's finally come of age by embracing what it once feared: cinema.

Open Windows

Dear Guillermo Martel,
Documentalist

By Christopher Redmond

Fury

Dear Malcolm (Rocky) Stone,
Set Decorator

By Tim McEown

Tusk

Dear Joel Harlow,
Makeup Artist to Johnny Depp

By Kelan Young

Citizen Marc

Dear Morgana Duque,
Animation Designer

By Di Golding
